Text:
Plays perfectly on VLC.

Good job fachman!
Lags in parts in Media Classic Player. Works better in VLC but not perfectly.

lagging is because you use external filters in MPC. Check your configuration and set all internal filters.
Newest versions you can find here.
http://www.xvidvideo.ru/media-player-classic-home-cinema-x86-x64/
